title: ===Stalkers blade or trailblazer for Kha zix===

replies.body:
With the new change you can actually swap the jungle items for free before you enchant them which means you can do both.

I did it in my game today as Wukong jungle, I got rangers for the early sustain but when I went to upgrade it for the warrior enchanment I swapped to a stalkers.

I guess this might work better on Wukong because you're not going to be doing a lot of ganking pre 6 so there isn't really a downside to this strategy, though I guess Kha does do a bit more ganking early so it's really up to you.
Thanks a lot for the comment
